structured.description: A dropzone and attaches it to an HTML element, allowing users to upload files. The uploaded files are processed by uploading them to a PHP server and then displaying the images in the UI after verifying their format. Additionally, it includes Google Analytics tracking code for website analytics.

items.description: Checks if a file with the specified name exists in the 'tmp' directory. If not, it recursively calls itself after a 20ms delay until the file is found or the recursive count reaches zero. Then, it displays the image in two different places.

params.name: fileName
params.description: Used to construct a file path for temporary images.

items.name: delayThenShowImages

items.description: Checks if a specified URL exists by sending a HEAD request to the URL using XMLHttpRequest. It returns true if the response status is not 404 (indicating the URL exists), and false otherwise.

params.name: url
params.description: Used to specify the URL to check for existence.

returns.description: True if the HTTP status code received from the server for the given URL is other than 404 (Not Found), and false otherwise.

usage.description: It will return true if URL "https://www.example.com" exists, and false otherwise.

items.name: UrlExists
